Name: 故郷@{M}Home
Description: 船乗りが突然、服を脱ぎ捨てながら船縁に駆け寄り、狂喜の笑顔を浮かべた。「故郷だ!」彼は叫ぶ。「故郷だ!」@{M}A zailor runs to the rail, stripping off his clothes as he goes, beaming rapturously. "Home!" he cries. "Home!"

DefaultEvent.Name: 南へ@{M}South
DefaultEvent.Description: 彼は南へ - 旧き大陸に向かって - 泳ぐ。人工の星々の淡い光によって彼の頭は見え、波の上に顔をだす度にシルエットとなって浮かび上がる。やがて、彼は居なくなった。@{M}$false-star -> 偽星, Elder Continent -> 旧大陸$He swims south, towards the Elder Continent. His head is visible in the faint light of the false-stars, silhouetted as he bobs above a wave. Then he's gone.

ChildBranches.Name: 彼を行かせる@{M}Let him go
ChildBranches.Description: 出来る事は無い。@{M}Nothing to be done.

DefaultEvent.Name: 運が無い@{M}No luck
DefaultEvent.Description: 手を振り、叫び、旋回し、救命ベルトを投げる...どれも駄目だった。彼はただひたすら南へ - 旧き大陸へ向かって - 泳いでいる。人工の星々の淡い光によって彼の頭は見え、波の上に顔をだす度にシルエットとなって浮かび上がる。やがて、彼は居なくなった。@{M}$false-star -> 偽星, Elder Continent -> 旧大陸$Waving, shouting, circling, flung life-belts: no good. He swims south, towards the Elder Continent. His head is visible in the faint light of the false-stars, silhouetted as he bobs above a wave. Something rises from below to take him, and he's gone.

ChildBranches.Name: 旋回して彼を引き上げるように試みる@{M}Circle to try to pick him up
ChildBranches.Description: 燃料と時間を消費し、しかも彼が正気に戻らなければ意味が無いが...@{M}It'll cost fuel and time, and it's useless unless he comes to his senses...
